attributes.action: Urge All Banks To Clear Public Debt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tax Payers Money Was Injected Into British Banks, And Still The Public Have To Pay All Out Debts To The Bank, Surely As Us Tax Payers Bailed Them Out, They Should Bail Us And Clear All Our Debt And Get The Economy Moving Faster.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
